GPM8213LAN package¶

Submodules¶

GPM8213LAN.instrument module¶

GPM8213LAN.instrument implements the following classes:

Instrument High-level of GPM representation

class GPM8213LAN.instrument.Instrument(HOST, PORT=23, timeout=2, variables=[], pattern=4)¶

Bases: object

HOST :str, local ip address of the GPM (voir System > Congig > LAN on the GPM) PORT : int,23 for the GPM ,Telnet protocol timeout :float, time seconds to raise an error, variables = list of Variable, variable to measure pattern :int de 1 à 4 ,preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual

add_variable(variable)¶

add a Variable to the list of varaible (max : 34), don’t use self.variables.append(variable)

ask_variable()¶

Retrun variables in string format

change_pattern(new_patt)¶

Change the Preset (pattern) with the new one (new_patt)

close_connection()¶

close the connection and remove the remote control on the GPM

connect_to_instrument()¶

Establishes the connection with a GPM (via the socket library) and verifies that it is accessible

identification()¶

fetch the basics data about the GPM used

mesure_variable()¶

Retrun variables in dico of float format

parser_variables(data)¶

Convert string format to dico of float format

send_query(message)¶

Send a query, see user manual to know which command are query or set

send_set(message)¶

Send a set, see user manual to know which command are query or set

set_a_variable(variable, number)¶

DO NOT USE, send set to change 1 Variable of VALUE? command

set_variable()¶

DO NOT USE, send set to change VariableS of VALUE? command

variables_pattern()¶

DO NOT USE, associate variables with the current PRESET

GPM8213LAN.measurement module¶

GPM8213LAN.measurement implements the following classes:

Measurement instance of measuring to automate the measure process

Measurement_mode type of measurement with specific parameter

@author: Hugo_MILAN

class GPM8213LAN.measurement.Measurement(mode='single', instruments=[])¶

Bases: object

Crée un Insantance de mesure pour spécifier le mode, les appareils et les grandeurs à mesurer Attention : ces appreils sont très peu réactifs et des mesures précises et synchronisées sont impossibles, nous vous conseillons de les utiliser pour des régimes permanants

add_intruments(instrument)¶
class GPM8213LAN.measurement.Measurement_mode(mode)¶

Bases: object

defines type of measurment and its parameters single : one measure on call continuous : multiple single measure integrator : interger power during time (see urser manual p53)

specification(sample_time=1, time=10)¶

defines time and sample time which will be use if necessary

GPM8213LAN.variable module¶

GPM8213LAN.variable implements the following classes:

Variable variable which GPM-8213 can measure

@author: Hugo_MILAN

class GPM8213LAN.variable.Variable(function)¶

Bases: object

Function to display, to find the list go to page 76 and 77 in user manual

Module contents¶

GPM-8213-LAN access and smart measurment
